message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I believe you'll find it's worth every penny.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but my budget is limited. Would you consider lowering the price to $1200000? I believe this would be a fair compromise.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1200000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my original price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1350000. This is the lowest I can go, and I believe it's still a great deal considering the product's value.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I must respectfully decline at $1350000. My maximum budget remains at $1200000. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our positions.
